title: Mark Hughes: How Piastri's fearless Eau Rouge gamble decided the Belgian GP
summary: A race that began with caution ended in strategic clarity, as Oscar Piastri calmly fended off team-mate Lando Norris to win the Belgian Grand Prix and tighten his grip on the F1 title race.Mark Hughesanalyses the Spa event

qa_pairs.question: Which track is known for the challenging Eau Rouge corner?
Who was Oscar Piastri's teammate during the Belgian Grand Prix?
What was the outcome of the Belgian Grand Prix for Oscar Piastri?
